age.interpretation: Younger adults typically have lower baseline cardiovascular risk.

chol.interpretation: High cholesterol increases the risk of plaque buildup in arteries.

trestbps.interpretation: Resting blood pressure above 130 indicates hypertension risk.

thalach.interpretation: Lower maximum heart rate may indicate reduced cardiovascular fitness.

Glucose.interpretation: High glucose levels indicate impaired insulin regulation.

BloodPressure.interpretation: Low or high blood pressure affects diabetes progression risk.

BMI.interpretation: Higher BMI is strongly associated with insulin resistance.

radius_mean.interpretation: Larger radius values may indicate irregular or malignant tissue growth.

texture_mean.interpretation: Higher texture values often reflect heterogeneous tissue structures.

perimeter_mean.interpretation: Irregularly large perimeters may suggest abnormal growth patterns.

area_mean.interpretation: Larger mass areas are more commonly associated with malignancy.

smoothness_mean.interpretation: Lower smoothness values indicate more irregular masses.

compactness_mean.interpretation: High compactness may indicate dense, irregular tumor boundaries.

concavity_mean.interpretation: Higher values often correlate with malignancy due to inward curvature.

symmetry_mean.interpretation: Symmetry abnormality may indicate irregular tumor shape.

fractal_dimension_mean.interpretation: Higher complexity in fractal dimension might indicate malignancy.

radius_worst.interpretation: Worst-case radius is strongly associated with tumor severity.
